org.fujion.canvas.webgl

Class ContextOptionsWebGL

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.canvas.webgl.ContextOptionsWebGL
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOptionMapTransform, IClientTransform

    public class ContextOptionsWebGL
extends Options

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Boolean alpha
      Indicates if the canvas contains an alpha buffer.
      Boolean antialias
      Indicates whether or not to perform anti-aliasing.
      Boolean depth
      Indicates that the drawing buffer has a depth buffer of at least 16 bits.
      Boolean failIfMajorPerformanceCaveat
      Indicates if a context will be created if the system performance is low.
      Boolean premultipliedAlpha
      Indicates that the page compositor will assume the drawing buffer contains colors with pre-multiplied alpha.
      Boolean preserveDrawingBuffer
      If the value is true the buffers will not be cleared and will preserve their values until cleared or overwritten by the author.
      Boolean stencil
      Indicates that the drawing buffer has a stencil buffer of at least 8 bits.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContextOptionsWebGL()

        @Option
public Boolean preserveDrawingBuffer
        If the value is true the buffers will not be cleared and will preserve their values until cleared or overwritten by the author.

        Indicates if a context will be created if the system performance is low.
